attributes.action: Call on David Cameron to stand down for misleading parliament regarding Brexit
attributes.additional_details: I am signing this petition because I want David Cameron to stand down immediately. If he fails to do so, I would like a parliamentary enquiry to investigate this situation to determine whether parliament was mislead.
attributes.background:
David Cameron mislead parliament on February 3rd  - stating that Britain is a successful nation and one of the most influential in the world and Brexit is a viable option, and that "I rule nothing out".
It appears that at the same time he was privately initiating the 'Remain' campaign.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
